name: FlowAI
description: Performs quality control of flow cytometry data.

properties.name: Detailed
properties.description: Set to FALSE to only provide fail/pass, speeding up the analysis.

properties.name: second_fractionFR
properties.description: Fraction of a second that is used to split the time channel. Affects flow rate QC.

properties.name: decompFR
properties.description: Indicate whether the flow rate should be decomposed in the trend and cyclical components. Affects flow rate QC.

properties.name: outlier_binsFS
properties.description: Indicate whether outlier bins (not events) have to be removed before the changepoint detection. Affects sygnal acquisition QC.

properties.name: pen_valueFS
properties.description: Value of the penalty for the changepoint detection algorithm. Affects sygnal acquisition QC.

properties.name: max_cptFS
properties.description: Maximum number of changepoints that can be detected for each channel. Affects sygnal acquisition QC.

properties.name: sideFM
properties.description: Indicate whether the dynamic range check has to be executed on both limits. Affects dynamic range QC.

properties.name: neg_valuesFM
properties.description: Indicate the method to use for the removal of the anomalies from the lower limit of the dynamic range. Use 1 to remove negative outliers or use 2 to truncate the negative values to the cut-off indicated in the FCS file. Affects dynamic range QC.
